dcterms:description: A historical dataset containing 229 images of the Hungarian National Theater, primarily in gray-scale, with a few color images, along with a dense point cloud and camera poses generated using Structure from Motion.
dcterms:title: Hungarian National Theater Dataset

dcterms:description: A historical dataset containing 19 images of the Hotel International, used for testing reconstruction methods.
dcterms:title: Hotel International Dataset

dcterms:description: A historical dataset containing 37 images of the Observatory, utilized for evaluating reconstruction algorithms.
dcterms:title: Observatory Dataset

dcterms:description: A historical dataset consisting of 17 images of St. Michael Church, used for testing reconstruction methods.
dcterms:title: St. Michael Church Dataset
